sentences.en: But be warned: this is not a cheap option.
sentences.cn: 但要慎重：这个选择代价不菲。

sentences.en: Click this option to right-justify the selected text.
sentences.cn: 点击这个选项，使选定的文本向右对齐。

sentences.en: Co-operation was more than just an attractive option, it was an obligation.
sentences.cn: 合作不仅仅是诱人的选择，它也是一种责任。

sentences.en: Each bank has granted the other an option on 19.9% of its shares.
sentences.cn: 两家银行都同意给予对方其19.9%股份的期权。

sentences.en: He overstepped the mark and we had no option but to suspend him.
sentences.cn: 他的行为越矩了，我们别无选择只好将他停职。

sentences.en: He veered away from the most environmentally sound option.
sentences.cn: 他放弃了对环境保护最有利的选择方案。

sentences.en: He's crossed the Rubicon with regard to the use of military force as an option.
sentences.cn: 他已经下定决心使用武力。

sentences.en: I felt as though I should mention it as an option.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我好像应该把它作为一种选择提出来。

sentences.en: I would unhesitatingly choose the latter option.
sentences.cn: 我会毫不犹豫地选择后者。

sentences.en: It is thought that a management buyout is one option.
sentences.cn: 管理层收购被认为是一种选择。

sentences.en: Jones has taken an option on shares in the company.
sentences.cn: 琼斯已获得那家公司股票的期权.

sentences.en: Teenage mothers often have no option but to (= have no other choice except to ) live with their parents.
sentences.cn: 少女妈妈往往别无选择，只能与父母同住。

sentences.en: The job of chairman can no longer be regarded as a convenient soft option.
sentences.cn: 别再以为董事长这份工作是那么容易做的。

sentences.en: The menu changes weekly and usually includes a vegan option.
sentences.cn: 菜单每周都有变化，通常包含可供严格的素食者选择的菜肴。

sentences.en: There are a number of options available.
This was not the only option open to him.
sentences.cn: 这并非是他的唯一选择。

sentences.en: Using the option to display only text speeds things up a lot.
sentences.cn: 选用纯文本显示可以使速度大幅提升。

sentences.en: You will have to pay them; you have no option.
sentences.cn: 你必须付给他们钱, 别无选择.

不得不，被迫，除…之外别无他法

轻松的选择；较为方便的出路

trans.tran_cn: 选择，选择权，可选择的事物
trans.tran_en: a choice you can make in a particular situation
